original_text: She would go to be with the king in the evening. She would stay with him during that night. In the morning, she went to a different part of the harem. That was where the king's slave wives lived. One of the king's eunuchs, Shaashgaz, took care of them there. After that, the young woman would only see the king again if he was pleased with her. Then he would ask for her by name.
korean_text: 저녁이면 갔다가 아침에는 둘째 후궁으로 돌아와서 비빈을 주관하는 내시 사아스가스의 수하에 속하고 왕이 그를 기뻐하여 그의 이름을 부르지 아니하면 다시 왕에게 나아가지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: She would go to be with the king in the evening
She would stay with him during that night
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그 밤 동안 그와 함께 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: she went to a different part of the harem
That was where the king's slave wives lived
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 왕의 노예 아내들이 사는 곳이었습니다

sentences.original_text: One of the king's eunuchs, Shaashgaz
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 환관 중 한 명인 사아스가즈가

sentences.original_text: the young woman would only see the king again
sentences.korean_translation: 그 젊은 여인은 왕을 다시 볼 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: if he was pleased with her
Then he would ask for her by name
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그는 그녀를 이름으로 불렀을 것입니다
